alert.note: Alert for Atascosa; Frio; Medina (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 04 at 3:58PM CDT by NWS Austin-San Antonio
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Medina, northern Frio and northwestern Atascosa Counties through 445 PM CDT... At 358 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Mico to near Biry to 6 miles north of Sabinal. Movement was south at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Hondo, Devine, Castroville, Lytle, Natalia, Lacoste, Moore, Cliff, D`Hanis, Noonan, Dunlay, Bigfoot, Biry, Pearson, Yancey, Rio Medina, Bader, Government Canyon State Natural Area and Three Oaks. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
